description:
“I’ve been having a lot of fun,” Taylor admitted about his recent experiences. “I’ve been able to explore and try new things.”
Aidan laughed. “What things do you want to try today?”
“I like cumming inside a guy’s ass,” Taylor replied. “I think that would be fun!”
Aidan smiled and pretended to think about it for a second. “I’m sure we could arrange that!”
title: Taylor & Aidan: Bareback
